info.title: Tweet Sentiment Analysis
info.description: The Tweet Sentiment API lets you send small chunks of text - for example Tweets or Facebook Posts - and returns information about whether the sentiment is probably positive, negative or neutral, along with a score indicating how strong that probability is. It does this using natural language processing, breaking the text down into component parts and comparing those parts to a massive database of human-rated historical data.

get.description: Analyses a string of text and returns information about whether the sentiment is probably negative or positive, along with a score to indicate how strong that probability is.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text you want to analyse for sentiment, between 1 and 1000 characters in length
